snippet: Video of air strikes by the Syrian government released this week by Human Rights Watch and PBS Frontline offer harrowing glimpses of the impact of such bombings.
abstract: Video of air strikes by the Syrian government released this week by Human Rights Watch and PBS Frontline offer harrowing glimpses of the impact of such bombings.

headline.main: Filmmakers Capture Chaos After Airstrikes in Syria
